sprigatito.sc: Its fluffy fur is similar in composition to plants. This Pokémon frequently washes its face to keep it from drying out.
sprigatito.vi: The sweet scent its body gives off mesmerizes those around it. The scent grows stronger when this Pokémon is in the sun.

floragato.sc: Floragato deftly wields the vine hidden beneath its long fur, slamming the hard flower bud against its opponents.
floragato.vi: The hardness of Floragato’s fur depends on the Pokémon’s mood. When Floragato is prepared to battle, its fur becomes pointed and needle sharp.
